## DataSource.ready() method

Returns `true` if this `DataSource` is ready and the \[\[MapView\]\] can invoke `getTile()` to start requesting data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ready(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
